overview: Young children love puppies and dogs, usually pointing them out on the street with an enthusiastic, 'Doggie!' And your child will be fascinated watching dogs of all breeds and sizes -- from fluffy Golden Retrievers to roly-poly Beagles -- playfully hamming it up for the camera. It's a 'pound-full' of puppy love when these hounds get loose: there's a ballerina poodle...a real motorcycle mutt... a Dalmatian puppy to the rescue...and many more of the most cuddly, lovable puppies around. There's even a talent show featuring some of Hollywd's best 'trick dogs'!
title: Cute n' Cuddly: Adorable Doggies
